promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute basic cat electric-type pokemon with ornate fur. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltapurr, a a chibi cute basic cat electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: Gigaspark, Dark Moon-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "electric" or "Voltapurr". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, cat-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: This petite feline zaps playfully in bustling metropolises, using Gigaspark to light lamps and Dark Moon-GX to lull urban dwellers into sweet dreams.
